name: Horror Legends
description: In this online asymmetrical multiplayer nightmare, you can take control of a supernatural Legend and hunt down your friends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher; 64 bit version Processor: Intel i5-4790K Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 10 Processor: Intel i7-4790K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
